entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.3°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain or freezing rain. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets and rain changing to rain this evening. Fog patches developing this evening and dissipating overnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. Temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early in the afternoon. Temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. A few flurries beginning early in the evening and ending after midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
